name: Operation Cookie
description: This game is all about taking out your former boss President Cookie. You must reach him before time runs out or you'll be eliminated. To play this game you move forward with W and turn in the direction that you want to face by moving your mouse to the left or right side of the screen. You'll have 60 seconds to do so or it is game over. There are also additional routes that the player can take to reach President Cookie.
